The Iron full helm is a full helm made of iron. It is the second weakest full helmet available. While it grants greater defensive stats than its medium helmet counterpart, it has worse magic and ranged attack stats. There are no Defence requirements for wearing this helmet.

Players with level 22 Smithing can create an iron full helm by using two iron bars on an anvil while having a hammer in their inventory. Doing so will grant the player 50 Smithing experience.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+6+7+5-1+6

[[File:Iron full helm detail.png|left|120px]]
[[File:Iron full helm chathead.png|left]]
The '''Iron full helm''' is a [[full helm]] made of [[iron equipment|iron]]. It is the second weakest full helmet available. While it grants greater defensive stats than its [[iron med helm|medium helmet]] counterpart, it has worse [[magic]] and [[ranged]] attack stats. There are no [[Defence]] requirements for wearing this helmet.

Players with level 22 Smithing can create an iron full helm by using two [[iron bar]]s on an [[anvil]] while having a [[hammer]] in their [[inventory]]. Doing so will grant the player 50 Smithing [[experience]].
